p:
Propolis is a product of bees, known worldwide for its biological properties and used in traditional medicine. Propolis exhibits significant pharmacological activities such as anti-inflammatory
17, 18 , anti-oxidant
19, 20 and antimicrobial
21, 22 . It has also been demonstrated that propolis has anti-proliferative and anti-tumor effects in vitro and in vivo tumor models
23â€“ 25 .
